story_01_01000/2401_1001_0100_10:
This is Centra City, the biggest city on Pasio.
You might be surprised to know that Pasio is
a completely artificial island!
story_01_01000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Now then, I have a sync pair in mind 
that might be willing to join our team, 
so let’s go look for them.
story_01_01000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Oh, are you talking about that girl from Unova?
I think I saw her in the square up ahead
not too long ago...
story_01_01000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Will you please stop?! It’s against the rules to
force a Trainer to battle if they don’t want to!
story_01_01000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Sounds like trouble...
Do you think they’re OK?
We should see if they need help!
story_01_01000/2401_1001_0700_10:
I’m sorry, but I just can’t battle right now.
My Pokémon needs to rest—she’s worked
hard enough for today.
story_01_01000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Yeah! If you really want to battle, you’ll
have to challenge her another day!
story_01_01000/2401_1001_0900_10: Forget that! You’re battling me now, Champion!
story_01_01000/2401_1001_1000_10:
There’s no way I’m passin’ up a chance
like this! C’mon, let’s just battle already!
story_01_01000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Hey, you two! Cut that out! Don’t you see
you’re bothering them?
story_01_01000/2401_1001_1300_10:
You look like you could use a hand, Rosa.
Don’t worry—we’ll take care of these guys!
story_01_01000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Who are you? If you wanna start somethin’,
you got it! We’ll make you eat dirt!
